sentences.en: a local derby between the two North London sides
sentences.cn: 两个北伦敦队之间的地方性比赛

sentences.en: At Derby they detached two coaches from the train.
sentences.cn: 在德比他们从火车上摘下两节客车.

sentences.en: Big Ge s last minute winner in the Derby.
sentences.cn: 伟大的乔治·维阿在德比大战最后一分钟打进致胜进球.

sentences.en: Britain came second in the Prix St Georges Derby.
sentences.cn: 英国在圣乔治赛马大奖赛中荣获亚军。

sentences.en: He caught a 6.28-pound salmon in the annual fishing derby at Lake Winnipesaukee.
sentences.cn: 他在温尼珀索基湖举行的一年一度的钓鱼比赛中钓到了一条重6.28磅的鲑鱼。

sentences.en: I was enquiring in Lost Property at Derby.
sentences.cn: 我当时正在德比的失物招领处打听。

sentences.en: If we have a wet spell, Cecil could also run Armiger in the Derby.
sentences.cn: 如果我们遇上持续下雨，塞西尔也能让“扈从”参加德比马赛。

sentences.en: If you said the Kentucky Derby, you'd be right!
sentences.cn: 假如您的回答是肯塔基大赛马, 那您就答对了!

sentences.en: It's to be a buffet and I don't want to risk the Crown Derby.
sentences.cn: 那是餐具柜我不想拿皇冠徳比冒险[皇冠徳比英国著名的陶瓷].

sentences.en: Sitel and Derby varieties in Lanzhou area could produce seeds with high yield and good quality.
sentences.cn: 紫花苜蓿品种赛特(Sitel)和德宝(Derby)在兰州地区能获得高产、优质的种子.

sentences.en: That horse won the Kentucky Derby.
sentences.cn: 那匹马在肯塔基马赛上获胜.

sentences.en: The derby runs the little tykes through the most demanding obstacle course ever.
sentences.cn: 他们需要穿越最高年度的障碍场.

sentences.en: They had on faded derby hats with dents in them.
sentences.cn: 他们戴着皱巴巴褪了色的圆顶礼帽.

trans.tran_cn: 德比（英国中部的都市），德比赛马，大竞赛，<美>常礼帽，圆顶礼帽
trans.tran_en: used in the names of some well-known horse races
